name: Elemental (itch) (YourBest_Nightmare)
description:
In a world ruled by the four main elements: Earth, Water, Air, and Fire, Slimmothy Jimmothy the slime is brave and bold, determined to journey through each of the four sectors.  Slimmothy's quest is to defeat each ruler, take the crown, and become the fifth ELEMENTAL. 

Music

"(Blood) Stained Glass" by FoxSynergy licensed by CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/blood-stained-glass

"Bouncing Baal" by FoxSynergy licensed by CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/bouncing-baal

"Crystal Caves" by FoxSynergy licensed by CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/crystal-caves

"Disco Is Undead" by FoxSynergy lisenced by CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/disco-is-undead

"Oxide Whisper" by FoxSynergy licensed by CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/oxide-whisper
